short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Search stops accidental searches from the address bar. Works with any New Tab extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you typo a website address or paste unexpected text into the address bar, No Search will stop the accidental search and help you correct the typo. After correcting the typo, you can continue to perform the search or go to the website.

Works with any New Tab extension, so you can keep your favorite New Tab while preventing accidental searches.

With No Search, it takes less time to realize an accidental search happened. No Search intercepts Google and Bing searches from the browser address bar/omnibar and only searches if you confirm.

Works with Dark Mode so it's easy on your eyes.

Search better, only if you confirm, with No Search!
